text: The Cerros de Mavicuri are three hills in eastern Colombia, south of the city of Inírida on the Inírida River. The mountains are part of the Guiana Shield. Mavicuri is thought to be a sacred site by ethnic groups that live in the area. Its name means "blowgun of the mountains". It is named after the tool used by the natives to catch prey. Category:Colombia
title: Cerros de Mavecure
